{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Compex |model=AP-DK03 |price=520 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |type=wireless embedded board |flags=MU-MIMO |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ4028 |cpu1_cspeed=600 |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=16 |ram1=128 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 20-pin header |serial=yes,, 12-pin header |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPQ4028 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi2_chip1_model=IPQ4028 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8075 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=5 |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |stock_boot=Compex bootloader |stock_os=CompexWRT }} {{TagLine|2.4/5GHz 2x2 Wireless Embedded QCA Reference DK03 Board}} :[https://compex.com.sg/shop/embedded-board/wpj428/ Product page] :[http://shop.compex.com.sg/wpj428.html Buy from Manufacturer] See also Manufacturer's customized version of the board - [[Compex WPJ428]]. ===Product highlights=== *[[Qualcomm]] IPQ4028 @600MHz Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A7) CPU *QCA Reference firmware supported *2.4GHz 2x2 300Mbps 802.11n, 5GHz 2x2 867Mbps 802.11ac Wave 2 *802.11ac compliant & backward compatible with 802.11b/g/n *5x Gigabit Ethernet LAN RJ45 port with Auto-MDIX *DC input 12V/2A {| class="wikitable" |+SPECIFICATION TABLE |- |Product Type |Wireless Embedded Board, QCA Reference Design DK03 |- |Chipset |IPQ4028 |- |CPU Frequency |600MHz |- |Architecture |ARM Cortex-A7 |- |System Memory |128MB |- |Flash Memory |16MB |- |Wireless Standard |802.11ac, 802.11n, 802.11g, 802.11b, 802.11a |- |MIMO Channels |2x2 |- |Frequency Range |2.4GHz & 5GHz |- |Output Power (Per Chain) |20dBm @2.4GHz, 16dBm @5GHz |- |Wireless Speed |300Mbps @2.4GHz, 867Mbps @5GHz |- |Interface |1x JTAG 14 Pin Connector, 1x Serial Port 12 Pin Connector,
5x GbE Port, 1x RJ45 Console Port, 4x U.FL Connector |- |LED |7x LED Indicator |- |DC Jack |12V/2A |- |Reset Button |Yes, 1x H/W Reset Button, 1x S/W Reset Button |- |Operating System |QCA Reference Firmware |- |Certification |RoHS Compliance |- |Power Consumption |24 Watts |- |Temperature Range |Operating: -20ºC to 70ºC, Storage: -40ºC to 90ºC |- |Humidity |Operating:5% to 95% (non-condensing) |- |Dimension |155.5 x 113 x 23.5mm (W x H x D) |} ===See also=== :[https://www.compex.com.sg/embedded-board/ Embedded Boards] *[[Compex WSB419]] (DK04) *[[Compex WPJ428]] (DK01) *[[Compex AP-DK03]] (DK03) *[[Compex WPQ864]] *[[Compex WPQ865]] __NOTOC__
